channel.title: Making wildy safezone argh
channel.description: okay well, i download bubly shifre's new server and theres no nonwild or safezone in the server. i added it in myself and that still didnt work :mad: any ideas?

item.title: Making wildy safezone argh
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Change the coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942 and the other one too.
You would need to make them absX and absY as you would with public void nonWild.
Make the coords only lead to the wilderness, starting from level 1 and to the last wilderness level

Read full topic

item.title: Making wildy safezone argh
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

thought that would have something to do with it :S, but here it is could u make the fixes becuz im not too sure about what ur talking about

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3512 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Making wildy safezone argh
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Are you sure there none anywhere, so you can just attack anyone anywhere?

Anyways, maybe he has a different method.

Maybe he has only added the isInWilderness method, so if you have that, you can’t add safe zones unless you add them in. If you do have that method, make the coords of that different so they only fit the wilderness zone and not outside of the wilderness.

If your safezone you want to be in the wilderness in one spot, then it would be hard because you would have to make a few coords for that.

Read full topic
